title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.36 - Scheduled short-term care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-2.36 - Scheduled short-term care

State Regulations
(a) Residential health care facilities which provide scheduled short-term care for residents in accordance with Part 410 of this Title shall be paid a per diem rate of reimbursement for such services which is the average per diem rate of reimbursement for the facility as established pursuant to this Subpart. (b) The requirements of sections 86-2.11 and
86-2.30
of this Subpart relating to resident assessments and the submission of case mix information to the department shall not apply to scheduled short-term care in accordance with Part 410 of this Title. Notes
